Class CFG

java.lang.Object
org.jtool.graph.Graph<CFGNode,​ControlFlow>
org.jtool.cfg.CommonCFG
org.jtool.cfg.CFG
public class CFG
extends CommonCFG
An object storing information on a control flow graph (CFG).
